text: Naŋga kru mumɨŋga Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ ha yɨhɨta kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ kuma yawi vata nuŋandɨ kuyu tɨkatɨramandi. Kandɨhama, nuŋandɨ kuyu ha Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ handaya ñɨmbi yɨhɨta mandɨkatɨkatɨramandi. Nuŋandɨ kuyu ha Gotɨŋ naŋga Got nuŋambi kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ kandɨhañɨ kɨndi hamaŋ naŋga tɨkatɨkatɨramandi.
